review: I've had Chromecast for a few months now. I like it, but I can't say that I love it. I use it primarily to watch Netflix. I haven't had much luck with any apps to play video files off my computer (no VLC for a Chromebook). I find it annoying that Neflix stops after each episode, instead of going right in to the next episode. I'm a binge watcher, so this is very annoying to me. The pictures that appear on the screen when nothing is casting to the Chromecast are awesome though, so really cool nature shots. Honestly, the fact that I have a Chromebook with no good program/app to watch video files really limits my options with the Chromecast. This may work better with another system.
